level.heading: Performance audit.
level.text: The Auditor of the District of Columbia shall conduct a performance audit of the basic business licensing program and report to the Council not later than 5 years after April 29, 1998. At a minimum, this study should include an examination of the program cost and effectiveness.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2(q) of Streamlining Regulation Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-145, August 11, 2003, 50 DCR 6896).
